page.description: The DLG_MAINTOPT dialog component contains two radio buttons and two buttons.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: The DLG_MAINTOPT dialog component selects an administrative maintenance operation to run. The options include:

case.description: Clear empty carts - calls the ASWPROCESSING.A5W page.
Pack or Re-Index tables - calls the ASWPACKREINDEX.A5W page

case.title: Control Settings > Validation rules
case.description: General > Enable rules set to TRUE. General > Require value set to TRUE.

case.title: RadioButton Properties > Choices
case.description: Define Choices > List type is set to "Static". Define Choices > Choices is set to: Clear Empty Carts|cart Pack or Re-Index Tables |PR

section.title: Event Code
section.description: This AfterValidate event code calls the ASWPROCESSING.A5W page or the ASWPACKREINDEX.A5W page based on the option selected.
section.example: if alltrim(CurrentForm.Controls.Options) = "cart" CurrentForm.RedirectTarget = "aswprocessing.a5w" elseif alltrim(CurrentForm.Controls.options) = "PR" CurrentForm.RedirectTarget = "aswpackreindex.a5w" end if
